title: A Giraffe in the Room
description: Stanley Drummond is dreaming the worst kind of dream; the kind that never ends. Trapped in his subconscious and unable to find his way back to the real world, Stanley discovers that he can change his surroundings to at least make himself more comfortable while he waits for the alarm-clock to wake him up.Denise Kawaii's tragic novelette uncovers the lonely and confusing existence of a nursing home patient lost in the dreams and memories of a life once lived. A Giraffe in the Room inspires readers to cherish the memories of those they love, before the dreams they inhabit vanish.
author: Denise Kawaii
